name: elementaryOS GTK+ theme
description: Firefox theme for elementary OS Loki. Tested with Firefox 49.0
additional_info:
Turn off tab animations in about:config > browser.tabs.animate = false

Install the Launcher API extension for better desktop integration:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/unity-launcher-api-addon/?src=search

Install GNotify for native notifications:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/gnotifier/?src=search

Based off of:
https://userstyles.org/styles/132191/firefox-theme-linux-gtk-native-fx-29
